interpretation:
The new moon face card represents a time of renewal and transformation. Just as the moon cycles through its phases, our lives go through periods of darkness and light. This card reminds us that even in the darkest moments, there is always the potential for growth and change.

The new moon face encourages us to embrace the unknown and to let go of what no longer serves us. It is a time to set intentions and to plant the seeds of new beginnings. This card can also signify a need for rest and introspection, as we prepare to embark on a new journey.

Associated keywords for this card include darkness, transformation, renewal, mystery, intuition, and new beginnings. When this card appears in a reading, it may suggest that the querent is entering a period of significant change or that they need to embrace the unknown to move forward in their lives.
